title: How Gran Fondo Hincapie Greenville Raised $700,000 for Hurricane Helene Relief
content:
Mark Cavendish, Bradley Wiggins, Jolanda Neff among high profile guests for Greenville event as cycling community rallies toward the relief effort.

Read the full article at How Gran Fondo Hincapie Greenville Raised $700,000 for Hurricane Helene Relief on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
